Based on your preferences, I've created a customized reminder plan to help you stick to your morning routine:

**Reminder Schedule:**

* Monday to Friday:
	+ 7:00 am: Wake-up reminder (30 minutes before waking up)
	+ 7:15 am: Get ready to exercise reminder (15 minutes before exercising)
	+ 7:45 am: Start exercising
	+ 8:00 am: Finish exercising
	+ 8:10 am: Get ready to meditate reminder (5 minutes before meditating)
	+ 8:15 am: Start meditating

**Tips to Make it Stick:**

1. Set your reminders to recur every Monday to Friday, so you don't have to set them up individually each day.
2. Make sure your phone is in a convenient location, such as your bedside table, so you can see the reminders as soon as you wake up.
3. Consider setting your reminders to vibrate or play a gentle sound, so you're not startled awake.
4. Place your exercise gear and meditation space in an easily accessible location, so you can get started right away.
5. Try to establish a consistent sleep schedule, aiming for 7-9 hours of sleep each night, to help regulate your body's internal clock.
6. Be gentle with yourself if you miss a day or two. Don't get discouraged, and simply get back on track as soon as possible.

**Additional Suggestions:**

* Consider adding a 10-15 minute buffer between exercising and meditating to shower, change, or have a quick snack.
* You might want to set a reminder for the night before to prepare your exercise gear or meditation space, so everything is ready to go in the morning.
* If you're new to meditation, you might want to start with shorter sessions (5-10 minutes) and gradually increase the duration as you become more comfortable with the practice.

I hope this helps you establish a consistent morning routine and gets you back on track with your sleep schedule!
